unit: Unit 6 | Inference for Categorical Data: Proportions
title: P-value of a 2-sided Test Given z-score
question_text:
A significance test was used to test the null hypothesis ${ H }_{ 0 }$: $p=0.20$ versus the alternative ${ H }_{ a }$: $pâ‰ 0.20$. The resulting test statistic is $z=-1.73$.
The p-value for this test is approximately
